Text: Remove the restriction for Ground-only buildings (like Campfire)
Remove the restriction for roof-only buildings (like rooftop terrace).
You can always build platforms over 1x1 buildings (for example, you can now build a Double Platform over a Lumberjack Flag).
All buildings are solid and can be placed on top.
Any building with an entrance can only be constructed with the entrance at ground level.
Your building does not need any support at all. It can just float in the air. You may still need to build scaffolding to place the buildings and then remove them.
You can exceed the 3 hanging terrain limit to 50 (not higher due to performance impact).
